home.title: A curated, informative and educational resource on data and metadata standards, inter-related to databases and data policies.
home.subtitle: We guide consumers to discover, select and use these resources with confidence, and producers to make their resource more discoverable, more widely adopted and cited.

standard.title: Standards
standard.subtitle: The standards in FAIRsharing are manually curated from a variety of sources, including BioPortal, MIBBI and the Equator Network.

database.title: Databases
database.subtitle: A catalogue of databases, described according to the BioDBcore guidelines, along with the standards used within them; partly compiled with the support of Oxford University Press (NAR Database Issue and DATABASE Journal).

policy.title: Policies
policy.subtitle: FAIRsharing policies: A catalogue of data preservation, management and sharing policies from international funding agencies, regulators and journals.

collection.title: Collections
collection.subtitle: Collections group together one or more types of resource (standard, database or policy) by domain, project or organisation. A Recommendation is a core-set of resources that are selected or endorsed by data policies from journals, funders or other organizations.

license.title: License
license.subtitle: Using FAIRsharing content through the web or through our API

terms_of_use.title: Acceptable Use Policy and Conditions of Use

user.title: User private profile page
user.subtitle: Preview all the information related to your FAIRsharing account.

search.title: Search
search.subtitle: Search the FAIRsharing records using advanced filtering

api documentation.title: FAIRsharing API documentation
api documentation.subtitle: How to use the FAIRsharing REST API for you CRUD operations on records
